Micro-Ritual For Today

A 3-step reset you can do in under 5 minutes.

  1. 1. Breathe (3 rounds)

    Inhale gently through the nose for 4, hold for 2, exhale slowly for 6. Imagine a soft glow around your heart expanding on each exhale.

  2. 2. Place your hands

    One hand on your heart, one on your belly. Whisper, â€œI am allowed to move at the speed of my nervous system.â€

  3. 3. Choose one word

    Pick a single word for your day (e.g., â€œsoften,â€ â€œtrust,â€ â€œfocus,â€ â€œplayâ€) and let every decision orbit around that word.
